summary: In a near future society, a man claims that his dreams physically change reality. His therapist is confused at first, but soon decides to use him for his own gain.
cast: James Caan|Lukas Haas|Lisa Bonet|David Strathairn|Sheila McCarthy|Serge Houde|Suzanne Desautels|Belinda Hum|Tetsuro Shigematsu|Jonathan Higgins|Danny Blanco Hall|Conrad Pla|Daniel Do|Daniel Pilon|Steve Adams|Claudia Besso|Cas Anvar|Steve Anthony|Lori Graham|Caroline Van Vlaardingen|Caroline Van|Elisabetta Fantone
title: Lathe of Heaven
